Comments_List: There were some enjoyable and lively talks.
I learned a lot. The breadth of interests of different speakers was also good. Definitely liked having less neuroscience oriented faculty like Jiaying or Todd, for instance.

Strengths:
Good range of speakers
Lively discussion

Weaknesses:
The room is awful: there are not enough chairs most of the time and the projector needs a new bulb
There should be more student speakers (during the off weeks, don't reduce the amount of external speakers)
I'm not sure I like the 4-5:50pm time, but I know that for some faculty, it certainly is better--and I learn a lot just from hearing their questions, so maybe 4-5:50pm might still be better.
